txt.en: 'You have done much for us, friend [placeholder], and we are grateful! But I see that you are anxious to continue your pilgrimage through Khazad-d청m.\n\n'As a token of my gratitude, this goat here will take you to Nud-melek, and leave you at the stair atop Khadar-zar창m. Nud-melek is the last hall before reaching the sunlight of the Dale!'
'Hail, friend! What fortuitous timing; I see that you also seek to make your way through Nud-melek to the fair sunlight beyond. I do love company on my travels.'
'This goat will take you to Nud-melek, my friend.'
Nud-melek awaits! The last hall of Moria before reaching the sunlight of the Dimrill Dale stands before you on your road through Khazad-d청m.
The dwarf Svanr can be found upon the western stair of Nud-melek, atop Khadar-zar창m.\n\nYou should speak with Svanr.
